name: One Small Step - Team IDon'tSeeSharp
description:
Game created with ♥ for Jamfuser 2020 by:

  • Sebastian Ploch
  • Thomas Silver
  • Tanvir Khan
  • Corbin Mottram
  • Natalie Harvey

One Small Step is a small Platformer that's made to drive you to insanity. Filled with weird, wacky mechanics and law-breaking physics. How long will it be till you give up?
